default.name: default
default.text: The Wu Xing Compass harnesses the Winds of Magic to bring prosperity to Grand Cathay.\nDirecting the compass fills the respective energy reserve; the greater the energy reserve, the larger the benefits are. However, the energy reserve of all directions will decay over time.
